content.rendered:
Join the Saratoga Springs City School District Transportation Team! We’ll guide you every step of the way—so you’ll be fully licensed and ready to drive when school starts in September. 

No CDL needed to start—we provide in-house training.  Our future drivers are paid $20.00/hour during training and $25.15/hour after obtaining your CDL. 

Apply through RecruitFront by June 15, 2025 to join our summer training program. 

Training Timeline:  

June 30 – July 2, 2025 

  • Orientation 
  • CDL permit preparation 

Starting July 7, 2025 

  • ELDT theory training 
  • Pre-trip inspection practice 
  • CDL permit test 
  • Behind-the-wheel instruction 
  • Open and close range 
  • Road Test  

Take the first step toward a meaningful job that makes a difference in our students’ lives.
